name: logrocket-session-analyzer
description: Scrape and analyze LogRocket and AWS Device Farm session recordings using Firecrawl MCP - extract console logs, network activity, user actions, and performance metrics from test sessions

prerequisites.description: Requires Firecrawl MCP server for web scraping session recordings
steps: Install Firecrawl MCP server: npm install -g @firecrawl/mcp-server
Or use the mcp/firecrawl-mcp plugin from this marketplace
Ensure Firecrawl MCP is configured in Claude Code MCP settings
Optional: Install jq for JSON processing: brew install jq
Note: LogRocket sessions require authentication (SSO) - may need manual cookie extraction
